title: Data Analyst - Business Marketing
content:
Marketing Analyst - Business
We are looking for a Marketing Analyst to support our Business function to improve the way we communicate with our customers. The candidate should be passionate about our mission of Money Without Borders as this role can have a critical impact on the mission. The role will work in partnership with our marketing channels to improve the way they communicate with Businesses, to drive strategy and growth by providing data driven insights and recommendations based on experimentation.
In this role, you will have a unique opportunity to work with a rich dataset of over 3 million business customers and uncover insights and build tools to help our marketing teams optimise our relationships with our business customers. You will get the exposure to drive and build data products & tools that let us measure, optimise and scale our marketing activity for businesses.
Your mission: 
At Wise our mission is Money Without Borders - instant, convenient, transparent and eventually free. Whether our customers are sending money to another country, spending money abroad, or making and receiving international business payments, Wise is on a mission to make their lives easier and save them money. 
At Wise we have autonomous teams who are running a multitude of marketing channels. Marketing executives, creatives & analysts work together in these teams to get the right message in front of the right people at the right time.
Hereâ€™s how youâ€™ll be contributing:
As a brand new marketing function dealing with high value businesses, you will help to build the data infrastructure and performance measurement strategy for business marketing
Proactively make recommendations based on business insights and help guide the business marketing team in driving acquisition and growth of businesses
Own measurement & attribution in Business Marketing: you collaborate with your team on how to measure the performance of business marketing activities and find growth opportunities to scale business marketing
Improve how your channel forecasts and assesses performance and input recommendations to the investment framework
Become a Wise business expert and get up to speed on all of Wise business product features!
Collaborate with product teams to improve business marketing efforts and unlock areas of growth for marketing leveraging product features
Find, work with and assess novel marketing channels to drive business growth
Help build the business marketing roadmap using data and insights youâ€™ve gathered around Wise business customers
Contribute to, own, create, track OKRs for the business marketing team, keeping them accountable throughout the quarter
A bit about you: 
You have a background working in similar marketing analytics roles and have ideally worked on business marketing programs before or for a b2b product; you have an understanding of business marketing and business customers
You have advanced SQL skills, Python/R skills are advantageous 
Able to demonstrate that you can tell a  story and proactively give guidance on strategy based on insights
You are familiar with common marketing measurement tools & methodology such as attribution models
Youâ€™ve used cause and effect models before and worked on segmentation techniques
You have experience with data visualisation tools (Looker, PowerBI, Tableau etc.) and demonstrate storytelling ability with data
Youâ€™ve worked with marketing teams and/or external marketing partners and can manage senior stakeholders
What do we offer: 
Starting salary: 55K-75K GBP
Company Restricted Stock Units
Numerous great benefits in our London Office
Key benefits:
Flexible working - whether itâ€™s working from home, school plays or life admin we get that flexibility is essential and youâ€™re trusted to do the right thing and be responsible
Paid annual holiday, sick days, parental leave and other leave opportunities
6 weeks of paid sabbatical after 4 years at Wise on top of annual leave
note: We are unable to provide relocation or sponsor visas
#LI-JH1 #LI-Hybrid
 Salary (annual)Â£55,000â€”Â£75,000 GBPWe're people without borders â€” without judgement or prejudice, too. We believe teams are strongest when they are diverse, equitable and inclusive. We're proud to have a truly international team, and we celebrate our differences.
Every Wiser should feel that they can be themselves at work. Inclusive teams help us live our values and make sure every Wiser feels respected, empowered to share their contributions towards mission zero and able to progress in their careers.
Having diverse teams that reflect our diverse customer base helps us build a better product. We can be more creative and empathetic to our customer's needs and life experiences and makes sure we leave no-one behind on our journey to mission-zero.
If you want to find out more about what it's like to work at Wise visit Wise.Jobs.
Keep up to date with life at Wise by following us on LinkedIn and Instagram.

demographic_questions.header: Wise Diversity and Inclusion - Voluntary Demographic Questions
demographic_questions.description:
The following voluntary questions are intended to help us learn about the various identities and backgrounds that make up the candidates applying to Wise. If you don't feel comfortable answering you can select I don't wish to answer.

Providing us with this information will help us take actions that support underrepresented groups and make sure our hiring process is inclusive and fair for everyone.

The questions may be sensitive to some, please know your survey responses are secure and optional. All data will be handled anonymously, aggregated and not linked to you.There will be no adverse consequences if you do not wish to complete this questionnaire, or if you partially complete it or you select ‘prefer not to say’ to any question. It will in no way impact your opportunity to work for us within the application or hiring process.

Our privacy policy explains how we collect and process your data in accordance with applicable data protection laws. If you have any questions, please email hiring-privacy@wise.com.

questions.label: What gender identity do you most closely identify with?
I identify my race/ethnicity as (mark all that apply):

answer_options.label: Black or of African or Caribbean descent
